algorithm_technique: Iterate through queries, extract subarray, sort, and check for arithmetic progression.
problem_summary_simple: Check if subarrays, when rearranged, form arithmetic sequences.
problem_summary_technical: For each query range, extract the subarray, sort it, and verify if the difference between consecutive elements is constant.
key_insights: Sorting is crucial to check for arithmetic progression after rearrangement.
Using a set for checking element existence can optimize the arithmetic check.
The difference must be an integer, so check for divisibility.
